title: Anyone can tell me which words lead to this ridiculous suspension???
body:
The people who ruined my game experience get no punishment, the one who played properly and tried the best to win got suspended?

If I violate something, point it out, which words violate the "rules"???

Those Australian players who fed 1-10 get no punishment?

If so, I will never talk but only feed at least 0-20 when I find those idiots in my team.

Game 1
Pre-Game
Play My Own: i want top
Play My Own: counter pick
Play My Own: you pick for me
Play My Own: wait to see
Play My Own: can i have kennen?
Play My Own: teemo
Play My Own: ...
Play My Own: no swap i think
In-Game
Play My Own: keep feeding
Play My Own: so i can have a proper game next
Play My Own: where do you get the confidence to play mid?
Play My Own: 666
Play My Own: dont waste my time
Play My Own: otherwise i will block you
Play My Own: niu bi
Play My Own: 666
Play My Own: why do you play ranked?
Play My Own: funny logic
Play My Own: dont play then
Play My Own: ff okay?
Play My Own: why waste time?
Play My Own: who is 2-6 then
Play My Own: see you in my blocked list
Play My Own: enjoy all your defeat from now on
Play My Own: lol
Play My Own: you dont deserve my tears
Play My Own: you are just Australian
Play My Own: Stupid dogs of American
Play My Own: open ty
Play My Own: 2-7 garen
Play My Own: 1-8 ezrea
Play My Own: 2-5 zoe
Play My Own: boring
Play My Own: boring Australian players, arrogant but talentless
Play My Own: you will never admit the fact
Play My Own: being bad, feed but wont admit
Play My Own: 666
Play My Own: 1st time sylas though
Play My Own: still better than mid top and support
Play My Own: so can you imagine how stupid are they?
Play My Own: admit, they are just trash
Play My Own: literally trash
Play My Own: I am sure they have low IQ
Play My Own: how can ppl get 1-10?
Play My Own: i have never got this unless I feed intentional
Play My Own: to be honest, I cannot figure out what are in their brain, maybe only dirty water
Play My Own: zoe took mid from me, then play like this
Play My Own: it is really funny, right?
Play My Own: i was being too nice to you Australians
Play My Own: you dont deserve
Post-Game
Play My Own: 666
Game 2
In-Game
Play My Own: hit 6 soon
Play My Own: sup why do you go top?
Play My Own: sup
Play My Own: what are you doing?
Play My Own: you dont want to win right>
Play My Own: ???
Play My Own: support and top
Play My Own: ???
Play My Own: are you 2 intentional?
Play My Own: top no one go?
Play My Own: open ty
Play My Own: we have no one going top
Play My Own: report leona and maokai
Play My Own: 3-6 top
Play My Own: 1-7 support
Play My Own: ???
Play My Own: leona left top
Play My Own: with 77 cs
Play My Own: what are you 2 doing?
Play My Own: sup went to top
Play My Own: and top left his lane
Play My Own: zed
Play My Own: sivir
Play My Own: answer me
Play My Own: if you are duo with them?
Play My Own: leona left top
Play My Own: and kept typing?
Play My Own: ???
Play My Own: this is a clown
Play My Own: open ty
Play My Own: leona and maokai are 2 professional clowns
Play My Own: ???
Play My Own: leona
Play My Own: it's a waste of you to learn typing
Play My Own: and your dad should cum to the wall instead of your mom's inside
Play My Own: leona is intentional feeding, report pls
Play My Own: i think leona is crazy
Play My Own: and he does not know what is ranked at all
Play My Own: maybe it is first time leona
Play My Own: he left top lane to malphite
Play My Own: ff then
Play My Own: do not waste time
Play My Own: if you dont know what is karthus jg
Play My Own: go to see EDG vs OMG today
Post-Game
Play My Own: 这些鬼佬真的搞笑
Play My Own: 选个这个干什么
Play My Own: watch EDG vs OMG
Play My Own: okay?
Play My Own: watch the game
Play My Own: learn
Play My Own: stupid Australian player
Game 3
In-Game
Play My Own: why is kayle in top?
Play My Own: can you bot lane do something?
Play My Own: instead of feeding?
Play My Own: 1 vs 2
Play My Own: get double killed?
Play My Own: swap lane
Play My Own: you 2 go top
Play My Own: top has 2
Play My Own: lux where are you going?
Play My Own: go with adc
Play My Own: why is kayle in top
Play My Own: tell me
Play My Own: why is their support in top
Play My Own: if you dont want to win
Play My Own: stop playing
Play My Own: i go next ga,e
Play My Own: open to them
Play My Own: okay?
Play My Own: you bot lane had no reaction at all
Play My Own: open ty
Play My Own: i dont want to play with feeders
Play My Own: you bot lane
Play My Own: 2 vs sivir
Play My Own: even when kayn come
Play My Own: you 2 vs 2
Play My Own: 3-11 in total

Play My Own: they 2 vs 1
Play My Own: 3-11
Play My Own: top open thanks

Play My Own: next game thanks
Play My Own: SKT 3-16
Post-Game

Play My Own: lol
Play My Own: see you in my blocked list
Play My Own: :)
Play My Own: i am already used to this
Play My Own: feeders in Australia

replies.body:
>The people who ruined my game experience get no punishment

Riot keep punishments private, you have no way of confirming whether or not punishment was issued to another player and they have no way of knowing you received one until you share it. This is intentional and is done for a number of reasons. Chief among them privacy,  reform, and to prevent witch-hunting.

While there is a notification that will sometimes appear when your report has contributed to the punishment of a player, it is very limited, and not designed to be any form of confirmation or reliable data. It is only intended as a small bonus. Seeing the popup means a player was punished, but not seeing it does not mean the opposite, only that the conditions for the popup weren't met.

> the one who played properly and tried the best to win got suspended

Your gameplay has nothing to do with this punishment. The fact that you received a chat log and not a match history or replay in the reform card should make this obvious. 

Whether you went 11/0 or 0/11 is irrelevant in this case (assuming you weren't intentionally feeding). What *is* relevant is calling people dogs, explicit and vulgar insults on people's very existence, threatening open lanes, and generally being racist.

Such behaviour is not tolerated in this community. If you continue to engage in such behaviour, you will ultimately be removed from the community (assuming that this is not a permanent suspension, in which case you would have received an explicit warning of this already). Those are the rules you agree to in order to play this game whether you agree with the principle or not.
which word(s) get me suspended then? Please quote it out, then I will never mention any words related to that.

To be clear, there isn't just a "list of words" that Riot uses to punish players with. In the vast majority of cases, the context is more important that the words themselves.

A good example of this from your chat logs are the comments "you are just Australian - Stupid dogs of American". While the words "Australian" and "dogs" are nothing bad *on their own*, when they're combined (and particularly with a word such as "stupid") it becomes something that is just not acceptable in this community. The comments you made are, quite simply, racist, not because of the specific words you used, but the way in which you used them.

To quote myself:

>calling people dogs, explicit and vulgar insults on people's very existence, threatening open lanes, and generally being racist.

Ok, I cannot call Australians dogs of America, can I call them Puppet of America? The puppet state of Australia is well known, right? They dont have full sovereignty at all. This is political word, which may not be suspended.

I said "open ty" instead of threatening, is this also not allowed?

The problem is less the specific words, and more the insulting of an entire population of people. 

Spamming "open" and "next", says pretty plainly you've given up and aren't playing the game properly. Assuming your team hasn't agreed to a surrender vote, this is griefing, and in case it isn't clear from that being a report category, this is also punishable.

Chat punishments are less about the specific words_**~~*~~**_ and more about the sentiment. If you're being an asshole, it doesn't matter what exact words you are using, it's the fact that you're being an asshole.

_**~~*~~**_ Except in the case of mature (explicitly sexual or violent) language which you also demonstrated, this is a 13+/M rated game so mature content isn't allowed.

[_*~~This post~~*_](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/Ifb0rpEJ-riot-should-just-make-a-list-of-banned-words-and-how-not-to-be-condescending) gives a basic (and very well written) rundown of the more technical aspects of the system, and why it is the way it is.

Your judgement on who is the asshole is not fair, there is no fair judgement from the agreement of LOL, this is why I am asking.

If riot cannot explain in detail, then it is not acceptable. 

Anyway, I will definetely not type any words in the game, but I still firmly hold my comments, those who fed should apologize for making mistakes. But OCE players are really (mainly local) arrogant but talentless.
Not sure if you are serious or not . . .

I never take games seriously. Feeding is easy, you will never get suspended as long as you do not type any words in the game, no matter you feed or not.

But some of my comments on some people are really serious.

> niu bi
 boring Australian players, arrogant but talentless
Stupid dogs of American
stupid Australian player


Here is my favourite.
> see you in my blocked list

Who the ##$% do you think you are? Threatening to block people like you're their important friend, acting so important without a grain of merit.

Bring your friends here and let them be the judge 
https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Play+My+Own

I hope for your sake you're still young with room for growth. Otherwise, good luck; I cant see a bright future behaving as such.

What is your judgement then? Who are the feeders?

What is your "bright future" then? You get high when I speak out the truth?

If you Australian LOL players are good, then why do you have no championship? You cannot even get into group stage in world final.

If these words are exactly the ones that get me suspended, I will never mention any related to those. If not, point it out.

Funny logic.
china numba 1
At least much better than Australians in this game, right?

动态网自由门 天安門 天安门 法輪功 李洪志 Free Tibet 六四天安門事件 The Tiananmen Square protests of 1989 天安門大屠殺 The Tiananmen Square Massacre 反右派鬥爭 The Anti-Rightist Struggle 大躍進政策 The Great Leap Forward 文化大革命 The Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution 人權 Human Rights 民運 Democratization 自由 Freedom 獨立 Independence 多黨制 Multi-party system 台灣 臺灣 Taiwan Formosa 中華民國 Republic of China 西藏 土伯特 唐古特 Tibet 達賴喇嘛 Dalai Lama 法輪功 Falun Dafa 新疆維吾爾自治區 The Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region 諾貝爾和平獎 Nobel Peace Prize 劉暁波 Liu Xiaobo 民主 言論 思想 反共 反革命 抗議 運動 騷亂 暴亂 騷擾 擾亂 抗暴 平反 維權 示威游行 李洪志 法輪大法 大法弟子 強制斷種 強制堕胎 民族淨化 人體實驗 肅清 胡耀邦 趙紫陽 魏京生 王丹 還政於民 和平演變 激流中國 北京之春 大紀元時報 九評論共産黨 獨裁 專制 壓制 統一 監視 鎮壓 迫害 侵略 掠奪 破壞 拷問 屠殺 活摘器官 誘拐 買賣人口 遊進 走私 毒品 賣淫 春畫 賭博 六合彩 天安門 天安门 法輪功 李洪志 Free Tibet 劉曉波动态网自由门

Fine cotton, The Fitzgerald Inquiry, Sir Billy Snedden, Christopher Skase, The Lizard of Oz, Alan Bond, Rose vs Gina, Matt Brown's spectacular underwear escapades, Bob Hawke hosted nude meetings, Mal Colston.

Do you know your history of scandals?

Do you know your ancestors are lieterally a group of criminals and prisoners?

Do you know your ancestor worship is acturally pathetic and stupid?

Do you know that Australia has basically no political sovereignty at all? US warships stop everywhere in Australia, what a funny and humiliating story.
Better than being communist; That sent 80millions of their own people to death. Do you know anything about china? or did they brainwash it out of the history book?

the fact you dont understand that it's a 'scroll of banishment' and a meme and think it actually has anything to do with talking shit about history says a lot. it's more to do with your censorship laws. how have you not come across it in games by now lmao

besides, i am not british so no my ancestors are not the group of criminals and prisoners you are referring to, therefore there is no worship in regards to those ancestors either.

who gives a shit about "political sovereignty"? 

you're either actually playing on oce server from china, or my guess, you are here because daddy sent you here to get a degree. either one says a lot more about you than it does us lmao.

Do you know there is one degree called PhD? Do you know there is one scholarship called IPRS which is granted from your government?

It is really funny that you cover your ears, fear of admitting the fact that you lack of talents to represent native Australians to win either LOL world championship or anything else.

You do not care political sovereignty because your government taught you not to. Think the American way, who are Australians to Americans? Puppet, marionette, probably.

Your history is just a joke. I do have a lot of fun reading it. No one cares, me, Chinese, British, American, and yourselves. What a joke. You have basically no significance to the world, so no one likes to say about you.

To win the respect, you need to show basic skills and talents. Therefore there is no respect for me to do with your LOL players as they have both no talents and no skills. If you can understand Chinese, followed are my final comments:

你们这些高傲却无能，叫嚣却软弱的垃圾，也配和我比较？一群玩家，犯了错承认都不敢承认，一句“我不关心”就当万事大吉？自己被虐杀了还给自己找这种借口，无非就是阿Q精神。我只是把这个事实讲出来而已，你们就高潮了，多么可笑的意识形态。祝你们这些垃圾早日毁掉这片土地。

there is no longer a scholarship called IPRS. so maybe get the name correct if you're going to flex about useless degrees and scholarships. but i guess the main point went over your head? you are spewing such hatred for australia and trying to promote your own country as superior, but you are in this country to get a qualification. that speaks volumes about your own. you talk about IQ but your life seems to be about paper qualifications and how powerful, politically and militarily, one's country is and how good you are in a video game or not. your last words are roughly "destroy this land as soon as possible". sounds like something to report to the federal police and get your ass deported. all this because you got punished for being a racist in a video game lmao. another nod to your so called high IQ.

cao ni ma

lol，you should speak it out in Chinese characters.

I am not destroying this land by the way.

you are wishing for it to be destroyed as soon as possible. that is literally what you said. you are not the kind of person the australian tax payer should be subsidising. don't be surprised if 1 day you find yourself having to defend your scholarship and visa.

I am saying some of bad people are doing this.

Don't use google translation, learn some Chinese firstly. Otherwise you cannot understand my words.

You're bronze 4 man, **you just dont know a reflection when you see it**.

Look at your spoiled brat like attitude. Do you think you will get into relationship acting like that?? And who would give you a job? Your personality is filled with blissful ignorance.

> If you Australian LOL players are good, then why do you have no championship? You cannot even get into group stage in world final.

ZERO CONTRIBUTION TO THE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP TEAM. Yet he think he can just ride their coat-tail like it is his birth right. Stop talking like you can be counted among the winners just because your country won; It doesnt work like that.

Here is an analogy for you.
Just because the top 5 students in your class recieved scholarships; Doesnt mean you can boast as if you've contributed toward their sucess. If anything you are beneath them. Might aswell called them masters, then they might spit some of the spotlight toward you. 

Look at yourself, such a shameful display. Dont bring shame to china with your haughty words, and follow it up with a shovel to dig a deeper hole. 

> If these words are exactly the ones that get me suspended, I will never mention any related to those. If not, point it out.

Yes. Those are the sentences that got you banned; And sentences are made out of words. So congratuation, you've managed to craft a combination out of the alphabets to acquired a ban.

I've already pointed it out. But what can i say. You are willfully blind.

It is pretty boring to argue if bronze players are bad or not.

They are bad, but they will always say "we are just playing for fun and we do not care winning or losing".

But being bad, is a fact. They are just looking for an excuse to let them feel a little bit better when they get slaughtered 0-11 by some smurf.

However, getting 0-11 is the truth. No one cares the excuse. They are just bad.
